column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////On behalf of my entire staff
column3: and for the positive aspects of your review. And although you have already stated your intentions to the contrary
column4: if you do happen to visit us again
column5: please ask for me or any of my managers and they will make sure your JINYA experience is vastly superior to this one. Lastly
column6: we wish you happy holidays to you and yours.
